title: Red Team Lab
description: A simulated red team engagement targeting a fictional enterprise. Focused on social engineering, initial access, lateral movement, and report writing.

title: SIEM Automation Toolkit
description: A Python-based toolkit to automate log parsing, normalization, and alert generation for popular SIEM platforms like Splunk and Elastic.

title: Phishing Simulation Platform
description: Built a lightweight, modular platform to conduct phishing awareness training with metrics tracking and customizable payloads.
